ad.title: Spacious, fully furnished rooms for rent in a house with a garden in East Wall
ad.content:
Located on Fairfield Avenue in the neighborhood of East Wall, this house is perfect for those who wish to live close to the city centre. The house is fully furnished, featuring four bedrooms available for rent along with a fully equipped kitchen, a living area with a back terrace and two shared bathrooms, both equipped with showers. Located on two floors, it provides plenty of space, privacy as well as storage for all your belongings. The nearby bus station enables easy access to the city centre, ideal for commuters. East Wall is also a home to shops and restaurants, as well as Dublin port.
![youtube rfEq_fp-5EI]
* This house is in an ideal location for those who wish to be close to the city centre! * You will have easy access to a bus station with many bus services available. * Wood floors are featured throughout, making the house easy to clean. * The house has a cosy living area where you can watch TV and relax on the sofas. * The kitchen is fully equipped and complete with a dishwasher. * The dining area has an exit to a large terrace where you can dry your clothes and enjoy spending time outside.
* Please note that smoking is only allowed in the back garden.
* Property type: house * Number of bathrooms: 2 * Wi-Fi installed: yes * Wi-Fi activated: yes
* Languages spoken: English * Lives on property: no * Deposit: 1 monthâ€™s rent * Payment method: cash; bank transfer
* Smoking allowed: yes (in garden) * Pets permitted: no
You can easily reach the city centre from the Newcomen Bridge station where you will have plenty of bus services to choose from!
![floorplan 1] ![floorplan 2]

ad.title: Furnished room for rent in a 2 bedroom apartment close to Phoenix Park, females only
ad.content:
***This landlord accepts females only.***
A fully-furnished bedroom is available for rent in a nicely presented two bedroom apartment on Hampton Square, in the neighbourhood of Ashtown. A 10-minute walk will take you to beautiful Phoenix Park, a 707-hectare green space offering attractions such as the Ashtown Castle, Dublin Zoo, a cafe and tea rooms. Several bus lines stop within a short walk and you will find a big supermarket only minutes away. You will be sharing this flat with the landlord, a friendly woman in her thirties. Shared areas include a bathroom with a bathtub, a comfortable living area with a dining table, and a kitchen equipped with all you need to cook your meals. You will also have access to a lovely balcony overlooking a green courtyard. The apartment comes with a range of appliances and accessories such as a washer/dryer, a television, electric heating and Wi-Fi. This warm and inviting flat will be a great place to call home!
![youtube lEV0xsXzElM]
* Then apartment is nicely decorated and has charming wooden floors. * Your bedroom is fully furnished and has a window with views over a beautiful green space. * The bathroom has a skylight that lets in a lot of natural light. * There are two closets in the hallway you can use to store items you do not need in your bedroom. * You will only be sharing the apartment with one other person, the landlady. * The living area is bright and spacious, and is furnished with two sofas, a flat screen TV and a dining table. * The balcony is equipped with a small table and two chairs, allowing you to have breakfast or enjoy a drink outdoors. * You will be able to stay fit by going for a run, walk or bike ride on Phoenix Park!
* Utilities are not included in the rent. * This is a non-smoking flat. * The room can be rented by females only.
This apartment is located on the fourth floor of a building which is equipped with an elevator. It has electric heating and electric water heating. The minimum lease for this apartment is 30 days (1 month). You can dry your washing using a rack inside the apartment or the dryer. Wi-fi is installed and it is activated.
The English speaking landlady lives on the property and requires one month rent as a deposit. Smoking and pets are not allowed. Rent should be paid by credit card, cash or bank transaction. This landlady accepts females only.
The friendly landlady, a woman in her thirties into fitness and travelling. The landlady occupies Bedroom 1 of the flat.
Buses 38, 38A,38B, 38D, 39, 39A and 70 stop 3 minutes from the apartment.
![floorplan]
